entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT/trimming property improvements #26483
    7.0.1xx
  • What is the usage of MS.NETCore.App.Host 3.1 and 6.0 in SDK and can it be removed for source-build? #26482

Closed

  • dotnet sln [solution] add [project] creates debug only configuration #22507
    Backlog
  • With .NET 7 preview7 installed, Failed to run winforms/WPF #26467

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.App from 2.2.0 to 2.2.6 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/RazorSimpleMvc22 #26484
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Nit code clean-up in RuleRunner #26475
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Fix dotnet sln add for older 4.7.2 projects wrong configuration #26329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove all of the extra run helix tests scripts for running non-helix… #26438
    Area-Infrastructure
  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fix static webassets pack when there are no assets in cross-targeting builds #26476
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Change linker to trim everything by default in 7.0 #26246
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Add --info Option to Workload Base Command For Future Triage #26458
    Area-Workloads
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Consume the razor source generator via nuget package #26399
    Area-Infrastructure
